verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Gittith, <S%H1665><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> our Lord, <S%H113><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> excellent <S%H117><s%> is your name <S%H8034><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth! <S%H776><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have set <S%H5414><s%> your glory <S%H1935><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>

Out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of babes <S%H5768><s%> and sucklings <S%H3243><s%> have you ordained <S%H3245><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> because <S%H4616><s%> of your enemies, <S%H6887><s%> that you might still <S%H7673><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> and the avenger. <S%H5358><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> I consider <S%H7200><s%> your heavens, <S%H8064><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your fingers, <S%H676><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the stars, <S%H3556><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have ordained; <S%H3559><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> is man, <S%H582><s%> that you are mindful <S%H2142><s%> of him? and the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> that you visit <S%H6485><s%> him?
For you have made him a little <S%H4592><s%> lower <S%H2637><s%> than the angels, <S%H430><s%> and have crowned <S%H5849><s%> him with glory <S%H3519><s%> and honor. <S%H1926><s%>
You made him to have dominion <S%H4910><s%> over the works <S%H4639><s%> of your hands; <S%H3027><s%> you have put <S%H7896><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> things under <S%H8478><s%> his feet: <S%H7272><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> sheep <S%H6792><s%> and oxen, <S%H504><s%> yes, <S%H1571><s%> and the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the field; <S%H7704><s%>
The fowl <S%H6833><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> and the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and whatever passes <S%H5674><s%> through the paths <S%H734><s%> of the seas. <S%H3220><s%>
O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our Lord, <S%H113><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> excellent <S%H117><s%> is your name <S%H8034><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth! <S%H776><s%>
